-- Create a view to score machine learning models.
CREATE VIEW wwi_ml.CustomerPrediction
AS
-- Select input scoring data and assign aliases.
WITH InputData AS
(
    SELECT
        [Cost],
        [Size],
        [Price],
        [PrimaryBrandId],
        [GenderId],
        [MaritalStatus],
        [LowerIncomeBound],
        [UpperIncomeBound]
    FROM [wwi_ml].[CustomerTest]
)
-- Using T-SQL Predict command to score machine learning models. 
SELECT *
FROM PREDICT (MODEL = (SELECT [model] FROM wwi_ml.AMLModel WHERE [ID] = 'aml-synapse-classifier:1'),
              DATA = InputData,
              RUNTIME = ONNX) WITH ([label_out] [bigint])
GO

-- Display the results.
SELECT * FROM wwi_ml.CustomerPrediction
